item.title: Report X-2024040848
item.description:
Report X-2024040848

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-22T15:11:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-10
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING ON THE UNLOAD TRAILER FROM THE PREVIOUS FACILITY. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME LOOSE ON THE PLASTIC JUG CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT INTERNALLY AND COAT THE OTHER JUGS IN THE PACKAGE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.
